segments.text: I observe the kitchen layout with the sink on the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands facing the plate she's drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet water flows steadily into the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It spills over the edge onto the floor below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A stool is positioned in front of the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy climbs it to access the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He reaches into the cookie jar with one hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands nearby, arm extended upward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains frame the window above the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view includes a path and plants.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets have simple doors with pulls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are arranged on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene depicts a typical indoor setting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Light enters from the daytime window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything appears in a line drawing style.
segments.speaker: PAR
